00033 #ifndef DH_POCKET
00034 #define DH_POCKET
00035 
00036 
00037 /* Maximal distance between two vertices in order to belong to the same 
00038  * pocket (single linkage clustering) */
00039 #define MAX_CON_DIST 2.5
00040 
00041 /* -----------------------------INCLUDES--------------------------------------*/
00042

00044 #include <stdio.h>

00055 /* ---------------------- PUBLIC STRUCTURES ----------------------------------*/
00056 
00057 /**pocket containing structure*/
00058 typedef struct s_pocket
00059 {
00060     s_desc *pdesc ; /**< pointer to pocket descriptor structure */
00061 
00062     c_lst_vertices *v_lst ; /**< chained list of Voronoi vertices*/
00063     float score,        /**< Discretize different parts of the score */
00064           ovlp,         /**< Atomic overlap     */
00065           ovlp2,        /**< second overlap criterion*/
00066           vol_corresp,  /**< Volume overlap */
00067           bary[3] ;                     /**< Barycenter (center of mass) of the pocket */
00068     
00069     int rank,                           /**< Rank of the pocket */
00070         size,
00071         nAlphaApol,                     /**< Number of apolar alpha spheres*/
00072         nAlphaPol ;                     /**< Number of polar alpha spheres */
00073 
00074 } s_pocket ; 
00075 
00076 /** Chained list stuff for pockets */
00077 typedef struct node_pocket 
00078 {
00079         struct node_pocket *next ; /**< pointer to next pocket*/
00080         struct node_pocket *prev ; /**< pointer to previous pocket*/
00081         s_pocket *pocket ;
00082 
00083 } node_pocket ;
00084 
00085 /** Chained list stuff for pockets */
00086 typedef struct c_lst_pockets 
00087 {
00088         struct node_pocket *first ; /**< pointer to the first pocket*/
00089         struct node_pocket *last ; /**< pointer to the last pocket*/
00090         struct node_pocket *current ; /**< pointer to the current pocket*/
00091         size_t n_pockets ;  /**< number of pockets in the chained list*/
00092 
00093         s_lst_vvertice *vertices ; /**< access to vertice list*/
00094 
00095 } c_lst_pockets ;
00096

00108 void set_normalized_descriptors(c_lst_pockets *pockets) ;
